branchCategory.name: 90/91-MY1B, Mechanical Joint Rodless Cylinder, Basic Type
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless Cylinder, mechanically jointed series 90-MY1B and 91-MY1B is great for long strokes with compact size and an integrated guide, the MY1 series rodless actuator provides an ideal solution. 90-MY1B is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 91-MY1B includes a "Lub-retainer" and is compatible with low dew point (40°C) applications. Standard strokes are available up to 2000mm.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 90/91-MY1B, Mechanical Joint Rodless Cylinder, Basic Type
